website_summaries.verdict: This handmade soap is ideal for those with sensitive skin who are concerned about animal welfare.
pros: Free of synthetic ingredients known to cause irritation
Unscented bar gentle enough for use on the face
Activated charcoal bar has Dead Sea mud for detoxifying
Goat milk bar has oats for soft exfoliation
cons: Expensive and bar is used up quickly

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars. Not that bad.
customer_reviews.text: Soap Bar...???? Name change needed to Soap No Last. Jul 15-Jul 26. Those dates are from arrived, to end of its life.(see pictures). Expected it to melt away faster, yet surprised of the opposite. Still....going to need a soap box for this one. Soap Bar does cleans pretty well I must say. Kinda leaves a little filmish feeling. Fragrance free....hardly. Over all I would get it again and use for a travel soap. Pricing needs to come down a couple bucks. Would think payment equals a bigger bar
customer_reviews.author: Amazon King

customer_reviews.title: The scent is overpowering
customer_reviews.text: It SAYS it's fragrance free. I've purchased fragrance free shea butter soap before, and it actually had no detectable scent whatsoever. This has a scent reminding me of strong spices and I will never be able to use it. I'm thinking I may have ordered this before since I have another bar with a similar scent that looks the same. This is NOT fragrance free and sensitive folks like me cannot use it.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara A. Roettjer

customer_reviews.title: Good soap
customer_reviews.text: This soap is good, but I think the price could be lowered considering it’s just one bar of soap. However, it seems to help my sensitive hands, and leaves them less dry than other soaps do. This soap is not really fragrance free; it smells like something, although I can’t pinpoint what it is. It smells nice, but if you’re looking for a soap that truly smells like nothing, this is the soap for you!
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn

customer_reviews.title: Lasts a really long time, feels great on skin.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this over a year ago and I cut it into sections. I’m still using it. It feels great, I usually hate bars cause I always feel dry and tight after. You will feel smooth and happy with this bar. Seriously my favorite and I saved some for travel. Super easy to travel with since it’s not liquid. Easy to store. Update: I finally ran out so I ordered again. I didn’t receive the fragrance free one I ordered, instead they sent peppermint tea tree. I was going to return it, but decided to keep it and try it out. I’m hoping I made the right decision.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing soap!! Perfect for allergies and sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.text: Great sized bar! I can tell it will last me a while. Completely unscented, but the natural shea scent is pleasant. I love that its suds up well, I dont have to keep lathering my washcloth throughout my shower, great for shaving, does not dry me out. Definitely will buy again! Worth the $9.
customer_reviews.author: katie lawson

customer_reviews.title: Great bar of soap!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I had a skin allergy that made my skin too sensitive to use most soaps and this product offered fantastic relief. I’ll be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie W.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t solve all your skin problems
customer_reviews.text: Relieved my eczema, but brought back my acne. I rarely break out in general these days, but noticed more facial breakouts a month after using this soap. I went back to my Dove Body Wash, which calmed down the acne breakouts but brought back the eczema. (so fun!) Will be discontinuing my daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Fuller

customer_reviews.title: very nice soap
customer_reviews.text: This soap does the job well and feels nice on my skin. i would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for cleaning your private parts
customer_reviews.text: I wash with this soap after having sex and no more UTIs! It’s gentle and non irritating on the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah VR

customer_reviews.title: This soap is great. I've tried dang near all the other "natural ...
customer_reviews.text: This soap is great. I've tried dang near all the other "natural soaps" their is. This one is great, it lathers well,doesn't dry my skin out. I have really sensitive skin. This soap is amazing. No break outs from it. If you have sensitive skin. BUY,BUY,BUY!. Thank you so much. Stuart M
customer_reviews.author: Dontae

customer_reviews.title: Wrong item sent
customer_reviews.text: Scent the wrong soap, I purchased sensitive bar. No rating yet waiting for correct item
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Really good product. Will dry out your face a little bit but overall great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: My son has sensitive skin and it is working great for him
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: All Natural
customer_reviews.text: I recently ordered two of these soaps, one in the lavender goats milk and the other in the fragrance free. I love that they are all natural and healthy for my skin. They are really nice. I will definitely be ordering these again!
customer_reviews.author: Valorie C.

customer_reviews.title: Suds up well!
customer_reviews.text: Mainly wanted to try this soap out because of it being unscented-ended up liking it for that and that it suds up nicely. Also a good idea to cut it in half to make it last longer!
customer_reviews.author: B.K.  Pimentel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! This soap is very gentle on my skin and is doing wonders for my rosacea!
customer_reviews.author: Caryln

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this soap! I'm addicted to it. Makes my skin so soft and smooth and moisturized.
customer_reviews.author: Herring

customer_reviews.title: Ok. . I've ordered 3 natural soaps in the last month. .
customer_reviews.text: and one I really liked, the other was ok -- but this one is the holy grail of soaps! I tried it last night before bed and unlike the others I didn't have that "filmy" feeling after washing. My skin looked marvelous after I rinsed. The soap itself is very mild, I love that it's unscented because I don't use anything scented on my face. It's very mild and has great lather. I can see now that this is going to be my "go to" soap. I highly recommend this soap!
customer_reviews.author: Crissy55

customer_reviews.title: VERY NICE
customer_reviews.text: Very Nice Fragrance free soap. I've ordered 2wice & will do so again.
customer_reviews.author: Christie Naglieri

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: cleans without leaving residue, moisturizing and not irritating to eczema
customer_reviews.author: Tobin

customer_reviews.title: Not fragrance free
customer_reviews.text: This product has a strong fragrance, but was touted as being fragrance free! Can't use as it immediately gave me a headache. Too lazy to return for just a bar of soap but let the buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Аmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this soap for less than a week and it has helped calm my eczema.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn D'Alessandro

customer_reviews.title: i really loved this soap
customer_reviews.text: i really loved this soap. it was great for my skin and i wish it was in stock. i ordered it but instead i got the lemongrass one which is black. i am not happy
customer_reviews.author: anneth amos

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: No kidding don’t hestitate buy this best SOAP I’ve ever used period.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Unscented...
customer_reviews.text: I have allergies and just inhaling the soap out of package, my eyes and nose started to itch. It went back. Perhaps, with usage, the scent would decrease but cant take a chance and its $10 for a bar.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Great soap with no irritating residue
customer_reviews.text: This is great soap! I have normal skin, but very sensitive eyes. Most soaps (and shampoos) leave a layer of moisturizer or residue behind which, when I perspire, runs into my eyes causing increased pain and irritation. This soap does not irritate my eyes a bit. It is the best I have found.
customer_reviews.author: Carolebmw

customer_reviews.title: Sign for a Bar of Soap?
customer_reviews.text: The soap is fine but gets used up a little too quickly to justify a $10 price tag. That and the fact that I had to take time off during working hours to go to the Post Office when they're open just to sign for a bar of soap took a couple of stars away from the rating.
customer_reviews.author: mntnmn

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: In spite of ingredients that sound moisturizing, leaves my skin squeaky clean, and I don't mean that in a good way. Also irritates the mucous membranes in my genital area.
customer_reviews.author: tbyg

customer_reviews.title: Not for dry skin.
customer_reviews.text: This soap dries out my skin and leaves it feeling tight and stripped of moisture. I feel squeaky like a dish afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: M.

customer_reviews.title: Not unscented
customer_reviews.text: Fragrance free? So aromatic you can smell it through the shipping package.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Bates

customer_reviews.title: A Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: I like this soap. It is actually fragrance free, lathers well, and doesn't take forever to rinse off. A good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Diana G.

customer_reviews.title: great for my skin
customer_reviews.text: great for my skin. love that it's unscented. used their advice and cut the bar in half. I'll be buying it again.
customer_reviews.author: Tnbigfut

customer_reviews.title: Great Soap!
customer_reviews.text: Great soap! Neutral scent, not greasy or thick and keeps you clean!
customer_reviews.author: NWSS

customer_reviews.title: The unscented soap has a strong floral smell
customer_reviews.text: The unscented variant of this isn't unscented. I could understand if smelled like shea butter, but It has a strong floral smell. It's not a matter of being delivered the wrong product; the label claims that it's unscented and it looks like the photo.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel P

customer_reviews.title: Product Review
customer_reviews.text: My husband has eczema. He has severe outbreaks from soaps and shampoos. We have been trying to find a bar of soap for quite some time that he can use without a reaction to his skin. This is a very good choice for someone that has allergies or eczema. It is smooth, moisturizing and met our expectations.
customer_reviews.author: CPutnam

customer_reviews.title: Skin feels great!
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping. Smells great and feels great. My skin is not so dry when I get out of the shower. You really cannot go wrong with shea butter. No complaints here
customer_reviews.author: KPOW

customer_reviews.title: Soft and gentle
customer_reviews.text: Very mild, great for weather beaten hands and face, but gentle enough for teen skin too. Doesn’t leave the skin feeling dry like other bar soaps. Good stocking stuffer gift too.
customer_reviews.author: jo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Sensitive Skin
customer_reviews.text: I have just started using this soap as a replacement for Tom’s Sensitive which is no longer available at a reasonable cost. Tom’s did me a favor! This soap is gentle, provides moisture, and I love that I can get fragrance-free. While this soap is not inexpensive, I have definitely found my new soap. I cannot comment on how long it lasts as I have just started using it, but I am following the maker’s directions.
customer_reviews.author: Dobielane

customer_reviews.title: Rub-a-dub-dub
customer_reviews.text: Just finished using this bar of soap. I was pretty happy with the lathering abilities. This is great if you need fragrance free and want a good lather!
customer_reviews.author: Mike P.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic soap, pricey but made my skin smooth and it seems like it will last a while.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

product_meta.title: Fragrance Free Soap for Sensitive Skin. Hypoallergenic Soap Bar. Natural, Unscented, Organic Ingredients. Moisturizing Shea Butter Soap. Vegan, Artisan, Handmade Soap.
product_meta.description:
Scent:Unscented Shea| Size:4.5 Ounce (Pack of 1)Simply the Best for your Skin! 

The Yellow Bird’s All Natural Soap provides the perfect foundation for maintaining healthy glowing skin. Unlike many other leading soap brands, we chose to make ours the old fashioned way; Cold processed, by hand, and only in small batches. This is a time consuming labor of love that’s completely worth it because it gives us total control over what ingredients are used. 

Why is this important? 

Your skin is porous and acts like a sponge absorbing whatever you place on it. For manufacturing purposes, the majority of commercially made soaps contain synthetic lathering agents, chemical preservatives, synthetic dyes, and chemical fragrances. All of which pollute your bloodstream and are harsh on your skin. 

 Made with Certified Organic Ingredients and NO 

-Parabens 
-Sulfates 
-Synthetic Fragrances 
-Synthetic Dyes 
-GMOs 
-Animal Testing 

100% Money Back Guarantee. Try now risk free and be on your way to more beautiful healthy skin.
feature_bullets: SOAP FOR SENSITIVE SKIN – Free of any chemicals and other ingredients that are often harsh on delicate skin. Our natural hypoallergenic soap is mild enough for children. Also it is non-comedogenic so it won’t clog pores.

GENTLE UNSCENTED SOAP – Perfect for those wanting a natural soap with minimal ingredients. Contains no synthetic or natural fragrances. Also includes no synthetic or natural dyes that may also cause irritation.

KEEPS SKIN SOFT AND SMOOTH – Made with a simple formula of organic plant oils and moisturizing Shea Butter to keep skin from drying out. Nourishes all skin types. An ideal cleanser for body, face, and hands.

MADE IN THE USA- Enjoy our artisan soap. Made by hand through traditional, small batch, cold process method in order to best preserve the quality and effectiveness of our natural and organic ingredients.
GUARANTEED RESULTS or your money back. If you don't love our artisan soap as much as we do, we'll be happy to provide you with a full refund.
